articles.title: Investors clash over Elon Musk's $46 billion pay package: 'The board has yet to ensure that Tesla has a full-time CEO' - Fortune
articles.description: Investors say Musk is spread too thin among his other companies to justify such high pay.

articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Forecast: Prices Fall Less Than 1%, Downtrend Expected? - FX Empire

articles.content:
